RunSynchronousCommand.Path: cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo:On Error Resume Next&echo:Set wmi = GetObject(^"winmgmts:\\.\root\cimv2^"^)&echo:Set drive = wmi.Get(^"Win32_DiskDrive.DeviceID='\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0'^"^)&echo:If Err.Number ^<^> 0 Then&echo:Msgbox Err.Description)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo:WScript.Quit 1&echo:End If&echo:If drive.InterfaceType = ^"IDE^" Or drive.InterfaceType = ^"SCSI^" Then&echo:WScript.Quit 0&echo:Else&echo:MsgBox ^"Assertion failed.^"&echo:WScript.Quit 1&echo:End If)"
cscript.exe //E:vbscript "X:\assert.vbs"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo:SELECT DISK=0&echo:CLEAN&echo:CONVERT GPT&echo:CREATE PARTITION EFI SIZE=500&echo:FORMAT QUICK FS=FAT32 LABEL=^"System^"&echo:ASSIGN LETTER=S&echo:CREATE PARTITION MSR SIZE=16&echo:CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo:SHRINK MINIMUM=1000&echo:FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL=^"Windows^"&echo:ASSIGN LETTER=W&echo:CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY&echo:FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL=^"Recovery^"&echo:ASSIGN LETTER=R)"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo:SET ID=^"de94bba4-06d1-4d40-a16a-bfd50179d6ac^"&echo:GPT ATTRIBUTES=0x8000000000000001)"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:rem Set keyboard layout&echo:wpeutil.exe SetKeyboardLayout 0409:00000409&echo:@for ^%^%d in (C D E F G H I J K L M N O P Q T U V Y Z^) do @()"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:if exist ^%^%d:\sources\install.wim set ^"IMAGE_FILE=^%^%d:\sources\install.wim^"&echo:if exist ^%^%d:\sources\install.esd set ^"IMAGE_FILE=^%^%d:\sources\install.esd^")"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:if exist ^%^%d:\sources\install.swm set ^"IMAGE_FILE=^%^%d:\sources\install.swm^" ^& set ^"SWM_PARAM=/SWMFile:^%^%d:\sources\install*.swm^"&echo:if exist ^%^%d:\autounattend.xml set ^"XML_FILE=^%^%d:\autounattend.xml^")"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:if exist ^%^%d:\$OEM$ set ^"OEM_FOLDER=^%^%d:\$OEM$^"&echo:if exist ^%^%d:\$WinPEDriver$ set ^"PEDRIVERS_FOLDER=^%^%d:\$WinPEDriver$^"&echo:^))"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:for /f ^"tokens=3^" ^%^%t in ('reg.exe query HKLM\System\Setup /v UnattendFile 2^^^>nul'^) do ( if exist ^%^%t set ^"XML_FILE=^%^%t^" ^))"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:@if not defined IMAGE_FILE echo Could not locate install.wim, install.esd or install.swm. ^& pause ^& exit /b 1&echo:@if not defined XML_FILE echo Could not locate autounattend.xml. ^& pause ^& exit /b 1)"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:rem Install drivers from $WinPEDriver$ folder&echo:if defined PEDRIVERS_FOLDER (&echo:for /R ^%PEDRIVERS_FOLDER^% ^%^%f IN (*.inf^) do drvload.exe ^"^%^%f^"&echo:^))"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:diskpart.exe /s X:\diskpart.txt ^|^| ( echo diskpart.exe encountered an error. ^& pause ^& exit /b 1 ^))"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:dism.exe /Apply-Image /ImageFile:^%IMAGE_FILE^% ^%SWM_PARAM^% /Name:^"Windows 11 Pro^" /ApplyDir:W:\ ^|^| ( echo dism.exe encountered an error. ^& pause ^& exit /b 1 ^))"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:bcdboot.exe W:\Windows /s S: ^|^| ( echo bcdboot.exe encountered an error. ^& pause ^& exit /b 1 ^)&echo:mkdir W:\Windows\Panther&echo:copy ^%XML_FILE^% W:\Windows\Panther\unattend.xml&echo:if defined PEDRIVERS_FOLDER ()"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:dism.exe /Add-Driver /Image:W:\ /Driver:^"^%PEDRIVERS_FOLDER^%^" /Recurse&echo:^)&echo:rem Strip 8.3 file names&echo:fsutil.exe 8dot3name set W: 1&echo:fsutil.exe 8dot3name strip /s /f W:\&echo:rem Set device setup region)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:reg.exe LOAD HKLM\mount W:\Windows\System32\config\SOFTWARE&echo:reg.exe ADD ^"HKLM\mount\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Control Panel\DeviceRegion^" /v DeviceRegion /t REG_DWORD /d 193 /f&echo:reg.exe UNLOAD HKLM\mount)"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\pe.cmd" (echo:rem Continue with next stage of Windows Setup after reboot&echo:wpeutil.exe reboot)"
cmd.exe /c "X:\pe.cmd"

powershell.exe -WindowStyle "Normal" -NoProfile -Command "$xml = [xml]::new(); $xml.Load('C:\Windows\Panther\unattend.xml'); $sb = [scriptblock]::Create( $xml.unattend.Extensions.ExtractScript ); Invoke-Command -ScriptBlock $sb -ArgumentList $xml;"
powershell.exe -WindowStyle "Normal" -ExecutionPolicy "Unrestricted" -NoProfile -File "C:\Windows\Setup\Scripts\Specialize.ps1"
reg.exe load "HKU\DefaultUser" "C:\Users\Default\NTUSER.DAT"
powershell.exe -WindowStyle "Normal" -ExecutionPolicy "Unrestricted" -NoProfile -File "C:\Windows\Setup\Scripts\DefaultUser.ps1"
reg.exe unload "HKU\DefaultUser"

Extensions.File:
HKU = &H80000003 Set reg = GetObject("winmgmts://./root/default:StdRegProv") Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
If reg.EnumKey(HKU, "", sids) = 0 Then If Not IsNull(sids) Then For Each sid In sids key = sid + "\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer" name = "LockedStartLayout" If reg.GetDWORDValue(HKU, key, name, existing) = 0 Then reg.SetDWORDValue HKU, key, name, 0 End If Next End If End If

<Task version="1.2" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/2004/02/mit/task"> <Triggers> <EventTrigger> <Enabled>true</Enabled> <Subscription><QueryList><Query Id="0" Path="Application"><Select Path="Application">*[System[Provider[@Name='UnattendGenerator'] and EventID=1]]</Select></Query></QueryList></Subscription> </EventTrigger> </Triggers> <Principals> <Principal id="Author"> <UserId>S-1-5-18</UserId> <RunLevel>LeastPrivilege</RunLevel> </Principal> </Principals> <Settings> <MultipleInstancesPolicy>IgnoreNew</MultipleInstancesPolicy> <DisallowStartIfOnBatteries>false</DisallowStartIfOnBatteries> <StopIfGoingOnBatteries>false</StopIfGoingOnBatteries> <AllowHardTerminate>true</AllowHardTerminate> <StartWhenAvailable>false</StartWhenAvailable> <RunOnlyIfNetworkAvailable>false</RunOnlyIfNetworkAvailable> <IdleSettings> <StopOnIdleEnd>true</StopOnIdleEnd> <RestartOnIdle>false</RestartOnIdle> </IdleSettings> <AllowStartOnDemand>true</AllowStartOnDemand> <Enabled>true</Enabled> <Hidden>false</Hidden> <RunOnlyIfIdle>false</RunOnlyIfIdle> <WakeToRun>false</WakeToRun> <ExecutionTimeLimit>PT72H</ExecutionTimeLimit> <Priority>7</Priority> </Settings> <Actions Context="Author"> <Exec> <Command>C:\Windows\System32\wscript.exe</Command> <Arguments>C:\Windows\Setup\Scripts\UnlockStartLayout.vbs</Arguments> </Exec> </Actions> </Task>

HKLM = &H80000002 key = "SOFTWARE\Microsoft\WindowsUpdate\UX\Settings" Set reg = GetObject("winmgmts://./root/default:StdRegProv") current = Hour(Now) reg.SetDWORDValue HKLM, key, "ActiveHoursStart", ( current + 23 ) Mod 24 reg.SetDWORDValue HKLM, key, "ActiveHoursEnd", ( current + 11 ) Mod 24 reg.SetDWORDValue HKLM, key, "SmartActiveHoursState", 2
